description: Caster, silver, English XVIIIc  cat. card dims 7'
inscription:
Mark and Inscription

Engraved on the side of each, an unidentified crest of a demi-antelope.
markings:
Mark and Inscription

Fully marked (Britannia standard) on side of each body.  Maker\'s mark and leopard\'s head erased on bezel on each lid.
object_name: Caster, one of a set of three
title: Caster, one of a set of three
